54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The Last Hour would not come until the women of the tribe of Daus would be seen going round Dhi al-Khalasa (for worship) and Dhi al-Khalasa is a place in Tabala, where there was a temple in which the people of the tribe of Daus used to worship the idol

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تَقُومُ السَّاعَةُ حَتَّى تَعْبُدَ دَوْسٌ ذَا الْخَلَصَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Hour Will Not Begin Until Daws Worship Dhul-Khalasah
